modName: Tail Removal Kit - Toggle Tails on Beast Races
summary: This mod adds a "Tail Removal Kit" that can be equipped or given to a follower to temporarily hide tails.
descriptionHtml:
[b]--- This mod now supports custom races! ---[/b]
The race previewed in my images is the Lykaios race by KrittaKitty ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57109/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57109/?[/url])

[b]Description[/b]:
This mod adds a "Tail Removal Kit" that can be equipped or given to a follower to temporarily hide tails.

The Tail Removal Kit can be found in the following locations (see images for reference):
[u]*Helgen, Torturer's Chamber[/u]
- There are two removal kits on the table in the center of the room.  One kit is laying on the table, the other is in the sack beside it.
[u]*Whiterun, The Drunken Huntsman[/u]
- There is one removal kit on a barrel near Elrindir.
[u]*Solitude, Radient Raiment[/u]
- There is one removal kit in the corner, behind the counter.


Please let me know if any bugs or conflicts are found.


[b]Workshop link[/b]: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=19270]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=19270[/url]

[b]Note[/b]: This item occupies the tail(40) slot.

[b]Updates[/b]:
- September 24th, 2014, 11:50pm: Reworked mod to support custom races.  Changed placement of tail removal kits.
author: DaltonTheHobo
